entry.title: D3 Update Pattern on Nested Data
entry.content:
D3 is a great JavaScript library to visualize data. Visualization is still an overlooked aspect of the Big Data picture. The real value of data comes from gaining an understanding and act upon that understanding. Visualization is a great way to make data understandable.

Additionally as we look closer to at the third V, Velocity, we need mechanisms to ingest and show events immediately, need libraries that are compatible with our Event-driven architectures. Hey, we finally have WebSockets, let’s use them!
